details.description: Working on debugging the activity report application

markdown_report:
# Daily Activity Report

## Executive Summary
- **Total Time**: 480 minutes
- **Categories and Groups**:
  - Coding:
    - ActivityReports project: 60 minutes
  - Work&Finance:
    - Unemployment: 30 minutes
    - Pensions-related: 30 minutes
  - Research:
    - AINews: 60 minutes
  - Others:
    - Others: 270 minutes

## Progress Report
Today, significant progress was made in debugging the activity report application, accounting for 180 minutes. An additional 60 minutes were spent on reviewing A&A news and watching AI news videos. Understanding unemployment and pension review each took 30 minutes. Overall, 480 minutes were dedicated to various activities.
